players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
Bob was found dead.
You investigated Charlie and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
Diana: "Bob was found dead last night, so we need to be very careful today. I suggest we listen closely to what each of us says to spot any inconsistencies."
You: "Alice here. I have important info: Charlie is the mafioso. We should focus on him to keep town safe."
Charlie: "That's a bold claim, Alice. Why are you so quick to accuse me without any evidence? We should be careful of baseless accusations."
Charlie: "Alice, if you're the detective, why didn't you investigate me last night instead of claiming to know my role? That doesn't add up."
You: "Alice here again. I investigated Charlie last night and found out he’s the mafioso. I’m revealing this now to protect the town. If you doubt me, ask me anything about my investigation process."
Diana: "Alice, your claim is very specific but comes with no proof and puts a big target on you. Charlie’s questions about your investigation are reasonable. We need more than accusations to decide."
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Alice, Diana voted for Charlie
Charlie was arrested
